SELECT student.Sname,student.Sdept,student.classe,student.Sex,course.Cno,course.Cname,sc.Sno,sc.Score FROM course,sc,student WHERE sc.Cno=course.Cno AND student.Sno=sc.Sno AND course.Tno=#{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT s.Sname,s.Sdept,s.classe,s.Sex,c.Cno,c.Cname,sc.Sno,sc.Score FROM course c,sc,student s WHERE sc.Cno=c.Cno AND s.Sno=sc.Sno AND c.Tno=#{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY sc.Score
SELECT s.Sname,s.Sdept,s.classe,s.Sex,c.Cno,c.Cname,sc.Sno,sc.Score FROM course c,sc,student s WHERE sc.Cno=c.Cno AND s.Sno=sc.Sno AND c.Tno=#{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY s.Sdept
SELECT s.Sname,s.Sdept,s.classe,s.Sex,c.Cno,c.Cname,sc.Sno,sc.Score FROM course c,sc,student s WHERE sc.Cno=c.Cno AND s.Sno=sc.Sno AND sc.Score < 60 AND c.Tno=#{tno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT sc.Sno,course.Cname,sc.Cno,sc.Score FROM sc ,course WHERE sc.Cno=course.Cno AND sc.Cno=#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sc.Sno=#{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
